title: Portfolio
description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features a responsive design, dark mode, and dynamic content loading.

title: E-commerce Mobile App
description: A full-featured e-commerce mobile application with product browsing, cart management, and secure checkout functionality.

title: Dashboard UI Design
description: A clean and modern dashboard interface design with data visualization components, user management, and responsive layouts.

title: Weather App
description: A weather application that provides real-time weather data, forecasts, and location-based services using a third-party weather API.

title: Task Management System
description: A comprehensive task management system with features like task creation, assignment, progress tracking, and deadline notifications.
